hero.title: Supporting Divisions
hero.headline: Empowering Excellence Through Strategic Support
hero.description: Our supporting divisions provide the essential infrastructure, administrative oversight, and operational excellence that enables NARA's research divisions to focus on their core mission of advancing aquatic science and sustainable resource management.

administrative.name: Administrative Division
administrative.description: The Administrative Division serves as the backbone of NARA's organizational structure, managing human resources, staff development, and administrative operations to ensure smooth functioning across all departments.
administrative.vision: Employees satisfaction and progress of NARA
administrative.mission: Enhance the Human Resources and implementing all administrative matters efficiently and effectively to achieve the goals of NARA

services.title: ISIMBU MEDURA Facility
services.description: Conference and event facility available for NARA staff and external parties

services.title: HR Services
services.description: Comprehensive human resource management including recruitment, training, and employee development

finance.name: Finance Division
finance.description: The Finance Division ensures transparent and accountable management of NARA's financial resources, providing comprehensive financial services that support research excellence and organizational sustainability.
finance.vision: To provide an efficient and effective financial environment in which to carry out research and development activities on exploration, management and conservation of aquatic resources
finance.mission: Enhance Accountability and Transparency of utilization of Public Funds and use of scarce resources economically, efficiently & effectively while attending the goals of NARA

serviceOperation.name: Service & Operation Division
serviceOperation.description: The Service & Operation Division provides the essential infrastructure and operational support services that enable smooth day-to-day functioning of NARA's research facilities and administrative operations.
serviceOperation.mission: Provide comprehensive infrastructure development, maintenance, and operational support services to ensure optimal functioning of all NARA facilities and equipment

services.title: Infrastructure Development
services.description: Planning, design, and execution of infrastructure projects including laboratory facilities, research stations, and office buildings

services.title: Maintenance Services
services.description: Comprehensive maintenance of electrical, civil, and mechanical systems across all NARA facilities

services.title: Vehicle Management
services.description: Fleet management including vehicle allocation, maintenance scheduling, and fuel management for research and administrative transport

cta.title: Need Support Services?
cta.description: Contact our supporting divisions for administrative, financial, or operational assistance
